description.value:
Lady Larksong is the Blessing of Song and Spirit. A handmaiden of Idonea, she is a patron of healers and artists.

Edicts: Give yourself fully to everything you attempt, always maintain hope that tomorrow will be a better day, treasure every gift you are given by those who matter to you.

Anathema: Allow perfection to be the enemy of good, lose your motivation to your regrets, spread despair.

Areas of Concern: Birds, spirits, cherished friends, peace.
